questions.question: From your text...the client of SS+K's goal is...

choices.answer: distinguishing ourselves in a market from similar sites
increasing awareness of a new website page for news
rebranding the company and getting a new logo and slogan
paid nonpersonal communication from an identified sponsor
personal promotion to up sales for a given period
consumers  help get the word out about a product
free nonpersonal communication from an unidentified sponsor

questions.question: The P of focus in this class is
Which is a job title in advertising...
Advertising plays a strong role in the economy becasuse...

choices.answer: It gets rid of all the bad companies because only good ones can afford it
It entertains consumers so they aren't bored
It provides useful information to consumers

questions.question: Which of the following brands uses spokes-characters?

choices.answer: Putting a recyclable logo on your products
making and promoting environmentally conscious products
Saying your products or sustainable or green though they are not
turning of the lights in your marketing agency each night

questions.question: When thinking of the difference between old and new marketing communication models, what is the main difference

choices.answer: New models allow businesses to talk to each other about consumers
New models allow consumers to talk to each other about companies
New models have few channels for reaching consumers

questions.question: What are two things you might do to ensure your innovations have to become viral? Use _ and _!
Having a message that uses emotion in what is said or done in the ad, is enhancing the reception of your ads with _!
Having a message that uses an expert with a doctors coat is enhancing that your communications are received using what?
Source Credibility and Source Attractiveness are basically the same theories?

choices.answer: A prosocial ad targeting those highly involved in the deciton process
A green marketing ad targeting those not involved in the deciton process
Public relations (PR) using source effects to enhance the message
Direct Marketing using situational effects to enhance the message

questions.question: As an advertiser, what theory support how this type of strategy will work on consumers.

choices.answer: Multiattribute Attitude, as it gives info on complex product attributes
Behavioral Learning, as it will pairs loved music with the brand repeatedly
Sensory Marketing, as it will get the ad noticed.
Cognitive Learning, as it uses tactics to help us store and retrieve info

questions.question: Advertisers use group identification. This ad uses _ to appeals to those who identity with this lifestyle, to buy polo.
